name: 死亡绽放
description: 北方森林里的森林生物们处于休眠状态，不被疲惫的旅行者和勇敢的战士所见。这些肮脏的东西等待着完美的出击时刻，一场只有和这片土地本身一样古老的生物才会进行的耐心实践，奖励是一顿肉与骨的盛宴，一场让土壤沐浴在黑暗、浓郁的腥红中的盛宴。

wikiSkinData.lore: An enchanting beauty she is, lithe in form, and colored like the flowering valleys frozen mid-bloom by winter's chill. Yet the creature Elise dines upon the flesh of maidens, allured by her delicate pulchritude, who dance softly into the jaws of a monster.

Hidden among the great flower-fields of the north are the Death Blossoms, primeval hunters whose disarming beauty would lull even the bravest knight to tears, if but for a moment. For Kha'Zix, feeding upon these hardy souls offers yet another chance at metamorphosis… and a moment is all he needs.
